name: product-collection
description: Product collection shows a list of products based on recommendations, relation types and category.

productCollection.description: Configure settings to choose appropriate data source & inputs for product collection

layout.description: Flag to show all products in a grid layout instead of carousel

allowBackNavigation.description: If set to true, back link will be displayed on PDP breadcrumb

clientRender.description: This property enables lazy load of module content. It supercedes Image lazy load settings for the module.

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

priceFree.comment: Text to show when product is free

ratingAriaLabel.comment: Text to show for rating aria label

originalPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the original price screen reader text

currentPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the current price screen reader text
